Name: Old Cuban
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with mint leaf floated in the centre of the cocktail.
Review: A luxurious, minty Daiquiri topped with a splash of fizz.
History: Created in 2004 by Audrey Saunders, New York, USA.
